prompt: <description>**Part 1: A Rectangular Prism with a Curved Side** **1.1 Create the Coordinate System** Begin by creating a new coordinate system at the origin of the 3D space. Rotate the coordinate system along the z-axis by -90 degrees and translate it along the y-axis by 0.1381 units. This new coordinate system will define the orientation and position of the first part. **1.2 Draw the 2D Sketch** Create a new sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. Draw three straight lines as follows: * Line 1: From (0, 0.1023) to (0.1294, 0) * Line 2: From (0.1294, 0) to (0.1294, 0.1023) * Line 3: From (0.1294, 0.1023) to (0, 0.1023) These three lines form face 1 of the prism. For face 2, draw five straight lines as follows: * Line 1: From (0.1294, 0.0) to (0.1575, 0.0) * Line 2: From (0.1575, 0.0) to (0.1575, 0.75) * Line 3: From (0.1575, 0.75) to (0.1294, 0.75) * Line 4: From (0.1294, 0.75) to (0.1294, 0.1023) * Line 5: From (0.1294, 0.1023) to (0.1294, 0.0) These five lines form face 2 of the prism. **1.3 Translate and Rotate the Sketch** Apply the rotation transformation according to the euler angles provided in the coordinate system component and translate along the vector defined. This will move and orient the 2D sketch in space and prepare it for extrusion. **1.4 Extrude the Sketch to Generate the 3D Model** Scale the sketch by the factor provided (0.75) in the sketch_scale property. Then, extrude the scaled sketch along its normal vector by a distance of 0.1381 units. This will generate the 3D model of the first part, which is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The final shape is centered on the white background. The width, height, and length of the part can be measured as follows: * Width: 0.1381 units * Height: 0.75 units * Length: 0.75 units</description>

{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.1381,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.1023],"End Point":[0.1294,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.1294,0.0],"End Point":[0.1294,0.1023]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.1294,0.1023],"End Point":[0.0,0.1023]}}},"face_2":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.1294,0.0],"End Point":[0.1575,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.1575,0.0],"End Point":[0.1575,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.1575,0.75],"End Point":[0.1294,0.75]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.1294,0.75],"End Point":[0.1294,0.1023]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.1294,0.1023],"End Point":[0.1294,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1381,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
